20101222020821.000|20101222020823.000|CC1|>> DID I MENTION THAT I HAVE A

20101222022829.000|20101222022830.000|CC1|CONGRESS FOR MORE THAN A YEAR.

20101222023605.000|20101222023607.000|CC1|        keep you awake...

20101222023610.000|20101222023610.000|CC1|    And if you wake up often    
20101222023610.000|20101222023614.000|CC1|  in the middle of the night... 
20101222023614.000|20101222023614.000|CC1|          rest is here,         
20101222023614.000|20101222023617.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20101222023617.000|20101222023617.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20101222023617.000|20101222023620.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20101222023620.000|20101222023620.000|CC1|           so you can           
20101222023620.000|20101222023622.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20101222023622.000|20101222023622.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20101222023622.000|20101222023625.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20101222023625.000|20101222023627.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20101222023627.000|20101222023627.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20101222023627.000|20101222023630.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20101222023630.000|20101222023630.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20101222023630.000|20101222023632.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20101222023632.000|20101222023634.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20101222023634.000|20101222023634.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20101222023634.000|20101222023636.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20101222023636.000|20101222023638.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20101222023638.000|20101222023638.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20101222023638.000|20101222023640.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20101222023640.000|20101222023640.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20101222023640.000|20101222023642.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20101222023642.000|20101222023642.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20101222023642.000|20101222023644.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20101222023644.000|20101222023644.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20101222023644.000|20101222023646.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20101222023646.000|20101222023648.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal.

20101222023651.000|20101222023651.000|CC1|            dizziness
